Package view

Class Visualisointi

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
view.Visualisointi
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, IVisualisointi
public class Visualisointi extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas implements IVisualisointi
This class is responsible for visualizing the simulation data. It extends the Canvas class and implements the IVisualisointi interface.
